example.eg: Have you considered the long-term consequences of this decision?
example.egtrans: 您考虑过这个决定的长远后果吗？

example.eg: Consider the implications of that discovery!
example.egtrans: 想一想这一发现意味着什么！

example.eg: She considered her options and what to do next.
example.egtrans: 她对自己面临的选择和接下来该做什么进行了权衡。

example.eg: Shani is considered a good student.
I consider my actions that day to be a mistake.  Many consider Mozart's "Requiem" to be his masterpiece.
example.egtrans: 我认为我那天的行动是个错误。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 评判, 认定, 认为

example.eg: Many people today consider corporal punishment to be wrong.
example.egtrans: 如今许多人认为体罚是错的。

example.eg: Henry is considering taking up a sport.
example.egtrans: 亨利正在考虑参加一项体育运动。

example.eg: She considered his face for a long time, and then smiled.

dsense.name: consider it done
dsense.guideword: informal (agreeing to a request to do [sth]) (非正式用语)

example.eg: I know you want the report finished tonight, so just consider it done.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 包在我身上，放心交给我吧，我会完成的

example.eg: Before you blame him, consider the circumstances.

dsense.name: consider the source
dsense.guideword: (be sceptical) (表示对信息来源的怀疑态度)

example.eg: Don't pay attention to anything he says: consider the source.
example.egtrans: 不要听信他的任何话，看看他信息的来源你就知道了。

example.eg: I'm an optimist: I refuse to consider the possibility of failure.
